channel.title: Make Psychic Message More Visible
channel.description:
I think it would be good if the Psychic name in their day ability message was colored slightly differently from the light blue used in everyone else's messages. Maybe just make the "psychic" name a darker blue.
That way, I would be a bit easier to see visually.
I think that the ability often relays important information, but it kinda blends into everyone else's messages and can be hard to see.

item.title: Make Psychic Message More Visible
item.dc:creator: Fenryll
item.description:
I also agree with you. A highlighted message would be helpful.

Read full topic

item.title: Make Psychic Message More Visible
item.dc:creator: Edmundson
item.description:
I completely agree with this, especially when there are people spamming the same information repeatedly and the Psychic ability gets overlooked in the mess.

Read full topic
